text: John Richard Reid (3 June 1928 â€“ 14 October 2020) was a New Zealand cricketer. He was born in Auckland, New Zealand. He played for the national team between 1949 to 1965. In 1962, Reid was appointed an Officer of the Order of the British Empire. Reid died in Auckland on 14 October 2020, at the age of 92. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2020 deaths Category:New Zealand cricketers Category:Sportspeople from Auckland
title: John Richard Reid
